story.title: Our Story
story.subtitle: Discover how HAVITAM was born from a simple vision
story.paragraph1: The idea of Havitam was born from a simple observation: artisans lose a tremendous amount of time on administrative tasks when they should be able to focus on their expertise.
story.paragraph2: After discussing with many independent workers, we realized that there was a lack of a simple, modern and intuitive solution, designed specifically for them.
story.paragraph3: The name HAVITAM comes from HA (the founder's initials) and vitam, referring to the "vitamin" that gives a boost to artisans' activity.
story.paragraph4: Our mission is to become the digital vitamin of construction, by facilitating daily management, reducing administrative time and increasing the profitability of professionals in the sector.

founder.title: Our Founder
founder.subtitle: Discover the vision that gave birth to HAVITAM
founder.name: Haitam A.

bio.paragraph1: Haitam A. is passionate about technology and entrepreneurship. After studying international business and several experiences in business creation, he was confronted with the complexity of administrative management, quotes, and invoicing.
bio.paragraph2: It was by discussing with artisan friends that he understood that this problem was widely shared in the sector. He therefore decided to create a simple and complete solution to meet their specific needs.
bio.paragraph3: Without coming from the construction industry, he knew how to surround himself, observe, listen — and build a useful and effective platform. Havitam was born from this vision: to offer artisans the digital tools they deserve.
